name: The Further Adventures of Uncle Sam
summary: Uncle Sam has been living peacefully in the American southwest, running a gas station. But when terrorists kidnap the Statue of Liberty, Uncle Sam teams up with an eagle to go rescue her.
info:
• 中文名: 山姆大叔历险记
  • 别名: 山姆大叔歷險記
  • 上映年度: 1971
  • 片长: 13分钟
  • 类型: 纪录片 / 短片
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 导演: Dale Case / Robert Mitchell
